job_title: Intensive Management Housing Officer in Derby, England
pros: Rewarding job role, knowing that we as a company/team/ individual really do make a difference to vulnerable people that are all too often overlooked in society.
Good experience for the future and training
cons: Low pay rate for high work load, very stressful, low reward work

pros: Great place to work, very family friendly and good holiday entitlement once you have passed the probation period.    The organisation like to promote from within, so you can go far with the right attitude and application.
cons: The people you work with can be challenging but it can also be very rewarding when you make a positive impact.

pros: Great colleagues and relaxed but professional atmosphere; found a great employer with good ethics and a steely determination to make a difference to the lives of the homeless.
cons: To date I have not found anything negative and have been employed by them for 2-3 years
